knimeNode.name: FeatureCountsMerger
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node can be used to merge the results of multiple feature count runs.

fullDescription.intro: This node can be used to merge the results of multiple feature count runs. As input it expects a list of feature count files and returns a table with the merged counts.
fullDescription.option: path where the merged file should be stored

option.name: remove the path of the file in the header

fullDescription.option: takes only the name of the file as header caption

option.name: remove the ending of the file in the header

fullDescription.option: removes the ending of the file for the header caption

ports.inPort: In the first column the path to feature count files are expected.
ports.outPort: Contains the merged feature count file.
